Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION
REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Limits the sale of chemical hair relaxers and permanent hairstyle kits
Summary: Limits the sale of chemical hair relaxers and permanent hairstyle kits to licensed cosmetologists.
LawCode: Add ยง399-tt, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to limiting the sale of chemical hair relaxers and at-home permanent hairstyle kits to licensed cosmetologists
